members.name: focus
members.descriptionHtml: Sets focus to the selected date.

members.name: formatDay
members.descriptionHtml: Callback to apply formatting to the days in the Day Picker calendar

members.name: formatMonthDayYear
members.descriptionHtml: Callback to apply formatting to mmmm d, yyyy formated dates

members.name: formatMonthYear
members.descriptionHtml: Callback to apply formatting to the month and year in the Day Picker header

members.name: formatYear
members.descriptionHtml: Callback to apply formatting to the year in the Month Picker header

members.name: closeIcon
members.descriptionHtml: Close icon

members.name: leftNavigation
members.descriptionHtml: FabricMDL2Icons name for the left navigation icon. Previous default: ChevronLeft.

members.name: rightNavigation
members.descriptionHtml: FabricMDL2Icons name for the right navigation icon. Previous default: ChevronRight.

members.name: allFocusable
members.descriptionHtml: Allows all dates and buttons to be focused, including disabled ones

members.name: autoNavigateOnSelection
members.descriptionHtml: Whether the month view should automatically navigate to the next or previous date range depending on the selected date. If this property is set to true and the currently displayed month is March 2017, if the user clicks on a day outside the month, i.e., April 1st, the picker will automatically navigate to the month of April.

members.name: className
members.descriptionHtml: Optional class name to add to the root element.

members.name: componentRef
members.descriptionHtml: Optional callback to access the ICalendar interface. Use this instead of ref for accessing the public methods and properties of the component.

members.name: dateRangeType
members.descriptionHtml: The date range type indicating how many days should be selected as the user selects days

members.name: dateTimeFormatter
members.descriptionHtml: Apply additional formating to dates, for example localized date formatting.

members.name: firstDayOfWeek
members.descriptionHtml: The first day of the week for your locale.

members.name: firstWeekOfYear
members.descriptionHtml: Defines when the first week of the year should start, FirstWeekOfYear.FirstDay, FirstWeekOfYear.FirstFullWeek or FirstWeekOfYear.FirstFourDayWeek are the possible values

members.name: highlightCurrentMonth
members.descriptionHtml: Whether the month picker should highlight the current month

members.name: highlightSelectedMonth
members.descriptionHtml: Whether the month picker should highlight the selected month

members.name: isDayPickerVisible
members.descriptionHtml: Whether the day picker is shown beside the month picker or hidden.

members.name: isMonthPickerVisible
members.descriptionHtml: Whether the month picker is shown beside the day picker or hidden.

members.name: maxDate
members.descriptionHtml: If set the Calendar will not allow navigation to or selection of a date later than this value.

members.name: minDate
members.descriptionHtml: If set the Calendar will not allow navigation to or selection of a date earlier than this value.

members.name: navigationIcons
members.descriptionHtml: Customize navigation icons using ICalendarIconStrings

members.name: onDismiss
members.descriptionHtml: Callback issued when calendar is closed

members.name: onSelectDate
members.descriptionHtml: Callback issued when a date is selected

members.name: restrictedDates
members.descriptionHtml: If set the Calendar will not allow selection of dates in this array.

members.name: selectDateOnClick
members.descriptionHtml: When clicking on "Today", select the date and close the calendar.

members.name: shouldFocusOnMount
members.descriptionHtml: This property has been removed at 0.80.0 in place of the `focus` method, to be removed \@ 1.0.0.

members.name: showCloseButton
members.descriptionHtml: Whether the close button should be shown or not

members.name: showGoToToday
members.descriptionHtml: Whether the "Go to today" link should be shown or not

members.name: showMonthPickerAsOverlay
members.descriptionHtml: Show month picker on top of date picker when visible.

members.name: showSixWeeksByDefault
members.descriptionHtml: Whether the calendar should show 6 weeks by default.

members.name: showWeekNumbers
members.descriptionHtml: Whether the calendar should show the week number (weeks 1 to 53) before each week row

members.name: strings
members.descriptionHtml: Localized strings to use in the Calendar

members.name: today
members.descriptionHtml: Value of today. If null, current time in client machine will be used.

members.name: value
members.descriptionHtml: Default value of the Calendar, if any

members.name: workWeekDays
members.descriptionHtml: The days that are selectable when dateRangeType is WorkWeek. If dateRangeType is not WorkWeek this property does nothing.

members.name: yearPickerHidden
members.descriptionHtml: Whether the year picker is enabled

members.name: closeButtonAriaLabel
members.descriptionHtml: Aria-label for the "close" button.

members.name: days
members.descriptionHtml: An array of strings for the full names of days of the week. The array is 0-based, so days[0] should be the full name of Sunday.

members.name: goToToday
members.descriptionHtml: String to render for button to direct the user to today's date.

members.name: months
members.descriptionHtml: An array of strings for the full names of months. The array is 0-based, so months[0] should be the full name of January.

members.name: nextMonthAriaLabel
members.descriptionHtml: Aria-label for the "next month" button.

members.name: nextYearAriaLabel
members.descriptionHtml: Aria-label for the "next year" button.

members.name: prevMonthAriaLabel
members.descriptionHtml: Aria-label for the "previous month" button.

members.name: prevYearAriaLabel
members.descriptionHtml: Aria-label for the "previous year" button.

members.name: shortDays
members.descriptionHtml: An array of strings for the initials of the days of the week. The array is 0-based, so days[0] should be the initial of Sunday.

members.name: shortMonths
members.descriptionHtml: An array of strings for the short names of months. The array is 0-based, so shortMonths[0] should be the short name of January.

members.name: weekNumberFormatString
members.descriptionHtml: Aria-label format string for the week number header. Should have 1 string param e.g. "week number \{0\}"
